snippet: A scene from Yael Farber’s documentary drama that recounts the story of a young Indian woman who was gang raped on a bus in New Delhi and subsequently died.
abstract: A scene from Yael Farber’s documentary drama that recounts the story of a young Indian woman who was gang raped on a bus in New Delhi and subsequently died.

headline.main: In Performance: Poorna Jagannathan and Japjit Kaur of ‘Nirbhaya’
